Package cchase.platformergame

Class Item

java.lang.Object
cchase.platformergame.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item.Roulette
public class Item extends Object
Item.java This class serves as a platform to be extended from to create collectable objects TODO: Allow the player to collect objects
